content:
System Features

  1. Backend management
  2. POS Frontend
  3. Full Menu Customization
  4. Product Management
  5. Inventory management and Recipe-based inventory
  6. Purchase
  7. Expense
  8. Employee Management
  9. System Configuration
  10. Advance User and Permission
  11. Dashboard
  12. Reports
  13. Promotion (Happy Hour)
  14. Multiple Branch Support
  15. Fields Customization
  16. Manage your business from anywhere
  17. Security and authorization


POS

  1. POS Branding (name, logo, photo can be change to fit business branding)
  2. Working Day and Shift Management
  3. Multiple Shift Support
  4. Cash Drawer Management to view current cash and management cash in and cash transaction
  5. Print WIFI password to customer
  6. Customer Sale Record
  7. Floor plan and Table organization
  8. Multiple sale types (dine-in, delivery, take away )
  9. Multiple currencies
  10. Multiple payment methods
  11. Multiple kitchen printers
  12. Print to kitchen cut by order, by items, or by quantity
  13. Multiple cashier station
  14. Multiple invoices and receipt language
  15. Invoice and receipt customization
  16. Waiting number
  17. Mobile phone and table order station
  18. Cross-platform support
  19. Flexible menu structure organization
  20. Cash In/Out Feature
  21. Split and Merge order/bill
  22. Pay on account
  23. Cashier shift and End of the day report summary
  24. Price rule manage by Table / Menu / Sale Type
  25. Exchange rate


POS Menus

  1. Flexible menu organization
  2. Has multiple level sub menu
  3. Menu can be separate by business branch or outlet
  4. Price rule can be assign to specific menu
  5. Photo background, background color and text color can be customize
  6. One product can contain in multiple menu location


Customer/Promotion Display

  1. Show current customer information
  2. Show current order information with discount and total amount
  3. Show slideshow of promotion or show cast menu
  4. Slideshow of promotion or feature menu can be upload by system admin
  5. Show thank you photo after payment
  6. Show change amount after payment


Product Management

  1. Product Group and Product Category (Multi-Level)
  2. Revenue Group
  3. Kitchen Group
  4. Modifier Management
  5. Combo Group Management
  6. Multiple combo group assignment
  7. Multiple Printer assignment
  8. Multiple POS Menu assignment
  9. Barcode Printing (Multiple Barcode Printing Customization)
  10. Product Barcode and Product auto generate code base on product category
  11. Multiple Product image
  12. Product name in English or Khmer or Other Language Customization
  13. Multiple Price Rule
  14. Multiple Modifier Group like Modifier, Extra, Exception, Sugar Level etc
  15. Multiple Product Type Support (Physical Product, Dish or Menu, Ingredient, Simple Combo Menu, Advance Combo Menu with Combo Group, Stock Product or None Stock Product)
  16. Apply Tax Rule for Specific Product
  17. Product Setting for POS:
  18. Allow Discount
  19. Allow Change Price
  20. Allow Free Item
  21. Allow Append Quantity when making multiple order in same bill
  22. Is Open Product. For adding product that does not exist in POS Menu to the order
  23. Statistic Information for Daily Sale, Month to date sale and Year to date sale information
  24. For allow or disable for sale by outlet or branch
  25. Each outlet or branch can have multiple price

Inventory

  1. Multiple Branch and Multiple Warehouse
  2. Stock Initialize on creating a new product.
  3. Basic Inventory for consumer and physical product
  4. Product Recipe Inventory
  5. Product Modifier can include recipe to update to inventory when selling from POS
  6. Product Combo can include physical product or food menu that contain recipe to update inventory.


Table Groups and Table Number Management

  1. Table Group Management
  2. Table can be customize(width, height, shape)
  3. Each table can be set with it own Discount Type, Default Discount Value, Price Rule and Sale Type


Tax

  1. 3 Taxes Level such as Service Charge, Public Lighting Tax and VAT
  2. Tax formula is configurable
  3. Tax can be apply before or after discount
  4. Product and Menu can set to different tax settings
  5. Each tax level can include other tax before calculation
  6. Tax Breakdown report

User and Permission

  1. Advance User Permission
  2. Module Base Permission
  3. Row level Security. allow user to view data from their station, outlet or branch
  4. Field level security. hide or show sensitive info in form detail like product cost, customer phone number, email or credit card info. etc
  5. Set Maximum Discount for each branch or outlet per user
  6. Multiple Role per User
  7. POS User Permission
  8. Allow user to delete bill
  9. Allow user to edit bill after received payment
  10. Allow user to change price of items
  11. Allow user to Change tax setting
  12. Allow user to access Cash In & Cash Out Feature. etc

Report

  1. Sale Report
  2. Sale Summary Report
  3. Sale Transaction Report
  4. Payment Breakdown Report
  5. Sale Tax Report. etc
  6. Purchase Order Report
  7. Purchase Order Summary Report
  8. Purchase Order Transaction Report
  9. Purchase Order Payment Report
  10. Vendor Credit Balance Report. etc
  11. Stock Report
  12. Stock Value Report
  13. Stock Take Transaction Report
  14. Stock Transfer Transaction Report. etc
  15. Expense Report
  16. Daily Expense Report
  17. Expense Summary
  18. Expense Payment Transaction Report
